To the Editor: A letter in your Q & A column on Sept. 10 asked about medical insurance abroad for travelers. Those concerned about health care options overseas may be interested in an organization called the International Association for Medical Assistance to Travelers, which provides a free directory that lists 500 medical centers in more than 100 countries.

The organization has approved doctors who have received training in a Western country, are fluent in English and have agreed to the Iamat fee schedule. For a small contribution, much other useful information is available.
Iamat can be reached at (716) 754-4883; the Web site is www.sentex .net/iamat.
